title: i cant purchase KLED?

replies.body: Are you still seeing this issue or has it been resolved by now? Let me know and I'll be happy to assist further. ^.^
Champions will be released as soon as they can, but it could be a few hours or a few days or over a week (typically it's on patch day). Just be patient, and it'll pop up in the store when available.

he is in the store but the price is not showing iam just asking if its from me or its for all people    
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I cant seem to buy him either but hes not even in the store for me :c
He's in the store already but unavailable , some how they release the champions and make them unavailable for a certain period just to annoy us ! {{summoner:4}} {{champion:240}}
